thread.title: Burke scores 17 to lead Jazz to 98-78 win over Nuggets
thread.title_full: Burke scores 17 to lead Jazz to 98-78 win over Nuggets

title: Burke scores 17 to lead Jazz to 98-78 win over Nuggets
text:
Burke scores 17, Gobert adds double-double to lead Utah Jazz over Denver Nuggets, 98-78 THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   11:41   11:41   
People: 
Utah (298) 

SALT LAKE CITY — Trey Burke scored 17 and Rudy Gobert had 14 points and 11 rebounds to lead the Utah Jazz to a 98-78 preseason win over the Denver Nuggets on Thursday night. 
Danilo Gallinari had 19 points and Gary Harris added 13 for Denver, which finished 4-3 in the preseason. 
Jazz: Brazilian rookie Raul Neto had 10 points, including two 3s, for his best scoring game of the preseason. . Gobert missed his first five free throws attempts. . Shot 54 percent and ended the preseason at 3-4. 
Nuggets: Regular starters Emmanuel Mudiay (hamstring), Joffrey Lauvergne (back) and Wilson Chandler (hip) sat out the preseason finale. 
Hot start: The Jazz started Neto at point guard and jumped out to a 14-0 lead. The Nuggets didn't score until Gallinari's layup with 6:36 left in the first quarter. Jazz led by as many as 27. 
Up next: Nuggets open the regular season Wednesday at Houston. Utah starts at Detroit on Wednesday.
